entry.title: Comment #1 on 'My comments run on email'
entry.content:
I think I'm very lucky to be the first to experience this function. I think the author's idea is very innovative. Maybe in the near future, I will be able to use this technology.

Almost everyone using the internet has an email address. In fact, for instance in China, many people neither have nor use email accounts. Of course, this is not the main point of this article, and there is no need to pay too much attention to it.
